channel.title: Tensorflow on HenryChang
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow on HenryChang

item.title: Cell2Art with CycleGAN
item.description: This project uses CycleGAN in (Tensorflow) to perform image to image translation and make a short artsy clip combining the fluid motion of cell and aesthetic of abstract paintings. For example, see an example video clip. Please view in smaller window since the videos are generated using frames of 256x256 pixels. See the report for project detials. Duration: Apr-May 2020 Github repo.
